version_description:
-Added Holiday Taxis to the app so you can now pre-book affordable transport options for Airport Transfers and Holiday Transfers
-Made it clearer to see hold luggage weight allowances across the app
-Fixed a bug causing ‘Temporary error’ for bookings with ‘Missed Flight Cover’
-Lots of other small bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using our app - If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

***Please note: Boarding passes may be removed from 'Boarding Passes' section after update. Simply go to 'My Flights' and download boarding passes again anytime***

• Flight Tracker just got even better - We have teamed up with FlightRadar24 to bring real-time aircraft tracking directly from within the easyJet app. From 3 hours before your flight you’ll be able to see the exact location of your aircraft when it’s in the air. Friends and family can also track your flight path when you are on your way to your destination.
• New 3D Touch actions - If you have an iPhone 6s or iPhone 6s Plus then you can quickly jump to Book Flight, My Flights, Boarding Passes and Flight Tracker by using 3D Touch (aka pressing hard on the easyJet icon) outside of the app. 
• Improved offline mode - More of the app is available without an internet connection, ensuring you don’t need to roam abroad or find the nearest Wi-Fi.
• We’ve added more helpful web links to various easyJet products and services. Just hit the menu icon on the top right of the home screen. 
• Plus, lots more bug fixes and performance improvements. 
Happy Travels!

P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

- Like our passport scanning feature? You can now securely scan your payment card too! Simply hold up your payment card to your phone’s camera when you want to pay to automatically populate the required payment fields.
- If You use the same card every time you book with us, then why not save your card securely for future use? We have introduced a save card feature allowing you to make bookings faster and easier.
- Plus, lots more bug fixes and improvements.

Happy Travels!
P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

- When tracking your flight on Flight Tracker, pull down to refresh the screen details. That pesky session expired bug in Flight Tracker has also been removed.
- Additional market groups have been added to the airport lists, including: North West England, Scotland and the Canary Islands.
- We’ve also been working tirelessly to reduce in-app turbulence, and make your journey with us as smooth as possible
Happy Travels!
P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Thanks for continuing to fly with us and for the positive reviews. As always we’ve been working hard to improve our app to make your easyJet experience even smoother.

Did you know we now offer gate and bag notifications at 12 airports? Available at: Belfast, Bristol, Edinburgh, Geneva, London Gatwick, Milan Linate, Milan Malpensa, Berlin Schönefeld, Lille, Jersey, Paphos and Larnaca.

Happy Travels!
P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Now accepting Apple Pay - gone are the days of scrambling around searching for a bank card to book a flight. If you have a compatible device (iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone SE) and a supported debit or credit card already set up in Wallet you’re good to pay in an easy, secure, and private way. Checking out is as easy as selecting “Apple Pay” and placing your finger on Touch ID. Booking flights has never been so easy!

We are currently supporting bookings in GBP, EUR and USD currencies.

Happy Travels!
P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Now accepting Apple Pay - gone are the days of scrambling around searching for a bank card to book a flight. If you have a compatible device (iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone SE) and a supported debit or credit card already set up in Wallet you’re good to pay in an easy, secure, and private way. Checking out is as easy as selecting “Apple Pay” and placing your finger on Touch ID. Booking flights has never been so easy!

We are currently supporting bookings in GBP, EUR and USD currencies.

In this version you can Change to an earlier flight…

We understand that plans change and sometimes you might want to move to an earlier flight for your return journey home. If we have availability, you can now switch to an earlier flight on the day of travel for a small fee. To check if we have availability for this offer, simply use the “Change flight” option when viewing your booking itinerary, and the best bit, you can do this on the go, even before travelling to the airport.

We will also allow you to check within our “Market Groups” meaning if you were meant to fly from London Gatwick, but there is an earlier flight departing from London Luton, and there is availability you can jump on that flight. Same applies for the destination airport too! #MixandMatch 

Also remember our app now supports Apple Pay for customers in the UK, France and Switzerland with the supported currencies of GBP, EUR, CHF and USD, making paying for your flights and extras super quick and secure!

Plus of course we have made lots more tweaks, modifications and bug fixes throughout the app.

Happy and safe travels!
P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

***We've fixed a little bug that was affecting some users importing bookings "Sorry! Provided LastName does not match the booking."***

In this version you can Change to an earlier flight…

We understand that plans change and sometimes you might want to move to an earlier flight for your return journey home. If we have availability, you can now switch to an earlier flight on the day of travel for a small fee. To check if we have availability for this offer, simply use the “Change flight” option when viewing your booking itinerary, and the best bit, you can do this on the go, even before travelling to the airport.

We will also allow you to check within our “Market Groups” meaning if you were meant to fly from London Gatwick, but there is an earlier flight departing from London Luton, and there is availability you can jump on that flight. Same applies for the destination airport too! #MixandMatch 

Also remember our app now supports Apple Pay for customers in the UK, France and Switzerland with the supported currencies of GBP, EUR, CHF and USD, making paying for your flights and extras super quick and secure!

Plus of course we have made lots more tweaks, modifications and bug fixes throughout the app.

Happy and safe travels!
P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

We’ve been working tirelessly to reduce in-app turbulence, and make your journey with us as smooth as possible.
Happy Travels!
P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

NOW BOOKING: Summer 2017. Flights available to book until 24th September 2017. Book early for the best choice of flights and fares.

Thanks for continuing to fly with us and for the positive reviews. As always we’ve been working hard to improve our app to make your easyJet experience even smoother. We've been listening to your feedback and we've added lots of small tweaks, fixes and improvements to this version.

Did you know… passengers travelling from Belfast use mobile boarding passes twice as much than the average for all other airports!
#WhyNot try our mobile boarding pass on your next easyJet flight! Available at 114 airports.

Happy Travels!
P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Bug Fix: Fixes a problem some customers were facing selecting downloaded boarding passes.

It might be the festive period but we've been hard at work sleighing bugs, munching cookies and wrapping up exciting new features for next year.

If you're feeling festive like us, #WhyNot book a flight to visit one of Europe's most beautiful Christmas destinations. Tuck in to some roasted chestnuts in Berlin, experience the Christmas lights in Copenhagen, or soak up the atmosphere in Old Town Square, Prague.

Happy Travels!

P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on  
app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Happy Travels!
P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

There are lots of things to do and discover in any new destination. The hard part? Figuring out where to start! In this version, we have teamed up with GetYourGuide to make it simple for you to find and book tours and activities, allowing you to research less and explore more. Check your booking itinerary within the “My Flights” section of the app and start discovering today.

We have also given our flight status delay push notifications a complete overhaul. Should your estimated departure time change, you will now be notified if this increases, decreases or returns to the original time. Keeping you informed at all times.

Get your holiday off to an early start by relaxing in an airport lounge. Our partner, Holiday Extras, have lounges at many of our airports. You’ll also get the cheapest price anywhere with their Best Price Guarantee. See your booking confirmation or itinerary and look for the Airport Lounges button.

No need to cram everything into a small cabin bag. You can now add a hold bag when you check-in on the app.

Happy Travels!

P.S. If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

We’re ready for the summer holidays…are you?
In this app version we have packed:
- Insect repellent - to get rid of those nasty bugs
- Bigger wings - to reduce in-app turbulence and increase stability
- On board announcements - accessibility improvements utilising VoiceOver
As always, thank you for your feedback and suggestions, keep them coming.
If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Apologies, looks like a little bug crept in that could have caused problems when downloading multiple boarding passes! 
All fixed now.

We’ve been working really hard on improving the pre-departure and on-the-day experience. In this release you’ll notice a brand new helpful home-screen widget with all the information you will ever need about your upcoming flight. There’s quick links to your boarding pass, Flight Tracker and Live updates so that they’re only ever 1 tap away. And we’ve also made lots of improvements to our Flight Tracker experience too.
If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

No big changes in this update, just a few small bug fixes and performance improvements. 

Thanks for all your great feedback, please keep it coming and we will continue making improvements to the app to make travel easier.

You can reach us directly on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

This update includes optimisation for iPhone X and other adjustments to improve reliability and speed.

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

In the Itinerary section of the app you will now find great discounts with our convenient new pre-order range of onboard offers. You can also view our Bistro and Boutique brochures in full.

We have also partnered with FLIO, the global airport app, to bring you insider hints and tips as well as exclusive discounts. Rolling out at the following airports: London Gatwick, London Luton, Manchester, Milan Malpensa, Basel, Geneva and Amsterdam.

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Don't have all of your party's travel documents to hand for online check-in? No problem, you can now check-in individuals in your party without having to check in everyone at the same time.

We have also partnered with FLIO, the global airport app, to bring you insider hints and tips as well as exclusive discounts when flying from the following airports: London Gatwick, London Luton, Manchester, Milan Malpensa, Basel, Geneva and Amsterdam.

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Decided where you want to go this summer but not got around to booking? Why not let easyJet holidays take care of the rest. If the destination has a package holiday available, we will let you know on the ‘Book Flight’ screen. Simple, carefree – the way every holiday should be.

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Summer is here, and our app is hotter than ever before. We've been working hard to make your experience as simple as possible, so that you have more time to crank up the tunes and grill some burgers. Sizzling!

Check-in all passengers on a booking with a single tap, and add all of your boarding passes to the Apple Wallet in one go. We've even expanded the number of boarding passes you can hold for a flight, up to 8 per device. Check-in has never been so easy!

Still deciding on your summer getaway? Our new inspiration tool (powered by LuckyTrip) can help you find your dream trip. Just tell us your budget and we will find you somewhere to go, somewhere to stay and something to make you happy!

Flying from London Gatwick this autumn? Explore the North Terminal in advance with our “easyJet: Airport Explorer” companion app. Already at the airport? Airport Explorer will also provide you with your very own airport sat nav with turn by turn navigation, so you will always know the best route and exactly how long it will take to reach the gate. You can even use the voice search feature to ask for a particular shop, restaurant or point of interest. Find out more by selecting the ‘Discover the Airport’ button on the My Itinerary screen.

Happy Travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Flying from London Gatwick this autumn? Explore the North Terminal in advance with our “easyJet: Airport Explorer” companion app. Already at the airport? Airport Explorer will also provide you with your very own airport sat nav with turn by turn navigation, so you will always know the best route and exactly how long it will take to reach the gate. You can even use the voice search feature to ask for a particular shop, restaurant or point of interest. Find out more by selecting the ‘Discover the Airport’ button on the My Itinerary screen.

Happy Travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

iOS 12 is here and you can now track flights with the help of Siri. Simply tap the ‘Add to Siri’ button on your itinerary screen to create a custom voice shortcut to your next flight details.
We’re also excited to be the first airline in the world that lets you search for a flight using just a photo! Select the camera icon on the Book Flight screen to try our new Look&Book feature and make your Instagram travel inspiration a reality.

Happy Travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

It might be the festive period but our merry elves have been hard at work ‘sleighing’ bugs and wrapping up exciting new features for next year.

If you're feeling festive like us, why not wrap up and head to a festive market in Berlin, Prague or Vienna. Twinkly lights, steaming mulled wine and icing sugar on everything – does it get any better?

Happy Travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Traveling light and unsure if your cabin bag is within the maximum permitted dimensions? Put the measuring tape away and try our new augmented reality bag sizing tool on the itinerary screen for that all important reassurance. Now all you need to worry about is how many pairs of shoes to pack! Our check-in all function has also gotten slicker, solo travelers as well as those in a group can now check-in for all flights in one go. Lastly, need to change your travel document details after the dog ate your passport? No problem! You can now update your travel document details even after you’ve already checked in. 
Happy Travels!
If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

It's spring cleaning time and we’ve been hard at work giving the app a spruce up. You’ll find lots of small tweaks, fixes and improvements in this app version – as always we’re working hard to make your easyJet experience even smoother. Thanks for continuing to fly with us.

Happy travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

It’s not all about the drama of Westeros, we’ve a couple of other things to excite you with in this app version. Here at easyJet HQ, our engineers have left their iron throne but have been busy slaying bugs rather than dragons. You’ll be glad to hear that we’ve made lots of tweaks, fixes and improvements. Our great new cabin bag sizer is also now available without a booking – find it in the home screen carousel or from the main app menu. If after all that, you’re still playing the Game of Thrones, why not live the fantasy with a trip this Summer? Loyal to the North? Belfast is the place to be. Prefer to march (or fly!) South? Get yourself to Dubrovnik for a taste of King’s Landing… Forget about Winter, Summer is coming. 

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Our app engineers have pulled themselves away from their holiday body prep to make our Cabin Bag Sizer even better - you can now measure an under seat bag as well as a standard cabin bag! They've also been working on lots of fixes and improvements, making your app experience smooth like  the Summer. And don’t you worry, we’re not out of ideas, we have super secret and super exciting things coming (which of course come with riveting release notes). Anyway, back to Summer… Here at easyJet HQ, we're dreaming of good times and tan lines. But what about you? Looking for some Summer inspiration? Why not use our Look&Book app feature to find those envy-inducing Instagram spots or check out Inspire Me on easyJet.com and get planning your next European adventure. 
 
Happy travels!
 
If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

They've also been working on lots of fixes and improvements, making your app experience smooth like the Summer. And don’t you worry, we’re not out of ideas, we have super secret and super exciting things coming (which of course come with riveting release notes). Anyway, back to Summer… Here at easyJet HQ, we're dreaming of good times and tan lines. But what about you? Looking for some Summer inspiration? Why not use our Look&Book app feature to find those envy-inducing Instagram spots or check out Inspire Me on easyJet.com and get planning your next European adventure.

Happy travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

One of our customers (let’s call him Dan*), wrote us a touching note to say that although our release notes were “cute”, they weren’t informative enough. So, Dan, this one’s for you! We’ve worked on some great stuff for this app update:
- Customers who add a booking (rather than logging in) can now add and pay for seats and bags.
- Lots of important work on a “coming soon” to make your payments more secure.
- We’ve also fixed a few issues, including a particularly pesky check-in bug.
 
* Name changed for privacy and to prevent reprisals.
 
If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

So, the Summer holidays are over. Time to officially remember what day of the week it is. Fret not, all is not lost, pumpkin spice lattes are here to save the day. And, if you’re lucky enough to be planning a post-Summer trip, our app developers have been working on an exciting ‘airline world-first’ - ‘Speak Now’. Make booking a flight as fast as a 737 with our great new voice search feature. You can find it in our ‘Book flight’ screen. If that’s not enough, we’ve also been beavering away on some small fixes and enhancements to make your app experience even better. 

Happy travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

So, after receiving lots of lovely feedback on our last app update content, we’re now confident that our customers are awake when they update our app! You passed our observation test with 'flying' colours - congratulations! This update includes some small enhancements to improve your easyJet app experience, plus our developers have been busy laying the groundwork for some upcoming features. Watch this space!

Happy travels!

So, after receiving lots of lovely feedback on our last app update content, we’re now confident that our customers are awake when they update our app! You passed our observation test with 'flying' colours - congratulations! This update includes some small enhancements to improve your easyJet app experience, plus our developers have been busy laying the groundwork for some upcoming features. Watch this space!

Happy travels!

Ahhhh January, the Monday of months... But, there’s no need to be glum, shake off those January blues and get planning your next easyJet trip! Our app developers have been busy making lots of small tweaks, fixes and improvements in this app version – as always we’re working hard to make your easyJet experience even smoother. You’ll also notice that car rental is now available to book alongside your flights... Why not pre-book your car online and save yourself some time at the airport?

Thanks for continuing to fly with us and happy travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Our app developers have been hard at work with some small enhancements and fixes for this app update. Plus, they've squeezed in a pretty nice makeover for seat selection which also includes accessibility improvements for our VoiceOver users. They've also been busy with some very exciting app features which will be heading to a handset near you soon… Using the easyJet app is about to get even more awesome (if that's even possible). 

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

It's spring cleaning time and we’ve been hard at work giving the app a spruce up. You’ll find lots of small tweaks, fixes and improvements in this app version – as always we’re working hard to make your easyJet experience even smoother. 

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Our developers have worked on some fixes and small improvements for this app update. They’ve also added vouchers on checkout so you can redeem any vouchers that you might have received from us recently. So, if you’ve had to curtail your trip, your days have merged into one and you can’t imagine having that sunkissed glow again – we feel you. Why not plan a new trip and get a holiday countdown going? We can’t wait to see you on board again!
 
If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Got an easyJet holidays trip coming up? If you do, not only are we totally jealous but you’ll also now be able to see your holiday details when you add your holiday booking to the app. Just add your booking via the ‘Add a booking’ feature using your easyJet holidays or flight booking reference within 30 days of your trip. Once added, you’ll be able to see those dreamy holiday details quickly and simply from your ‘My Trips’ section. And if you’re jetting away with us soon for a big Summer trip or a post-lockdown 'yay-getaway' weekend, have a read of our Fly with Confidence web page before you go: https://www.easyjet.com/en/fly-with-confidence.

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

For this app update, our developers have introduced a change search feature on flight results so you can change your search without having to return to the ‘Book Trip’ screen. So, if you’re looking at flights and decide that you’d rather be sunning yourself with a margarita instead of visiting your Mother-in-Law, go right ahead and make that change (and good luck to you sir). If you’re lucky enough to be already jetting away this Summer, we hope you have fun and we're looking forward to seeing you onboard. Please also remember to have a read of our Fly with Confidence web page before you go: https://www.easyjet.com/en/fly-with-confidence. Happy travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com.

Our app developers have been hard at work with some small enhancements and fixes for this app update. They’ve also reinstated the ‘Add to calendar’ feature on the Itinerary screen. Thank you to the eagle-eyed customers that spotted this and a sad goodbye to the developer responsible, best of luck in your new role. We jest! It was our Product Owner’s fault. If you’re flying with us soon for some much-needed Autumn or Winter sun, we hate you; the closest thing we’ve gotten to tropical palms is our slowly-dying desk pot plant. Before you jet away, please remember to have a read of our Fly with Confidence web page: https://www.easyjet.com/en/fly-with-confidence. Happy travels!

Warm jumpers, hot chocolate, crisp air and flushed cheeks... Autumn is in full swing and there's no better time than now to get cosy and start planning that much-longed-for trip. And our app developers continue to make your app experience even smoother by working on improvements and toasting bug-marshmallows. If you’re flying with us soon for some Autumn or Winter sun, please remember to have a read of our Fly with Confidence web page: https://www.easyjet.com/en/fly-with-confidence. Happy travels!

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on: app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Christmas has started early this year; mince pies have already been eaten and Santa has been quarantining at the North Pole in preparation for his night shift. The elves have also been busy working on a special gift for you night owls! At long last, dark mode is here. Be safe in the knowledge that you’ll no longer wake your kids, dog or significant other whilst you browse easyJet flights at 3am. And it’s not just for vampires, dark mode reduces eye strain, improves battery life and helps to improve visibility for people with low vision. You can switch to dark mode in your phone’s Display and Brightness settings. So go on, give it a go and join the dark side! If you’re flying with us this Winter, please remember to have a read of our Fly with Confidence web page: https://www.easyjet.com/en/fly-with-confidence. Happy travels!
  
If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on: app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com

Well, this will probably go down in history as the most depressing January in recent years, but shake off those (major) January blues and get planning your next trip for when the fog has lifted! Our developers have been working hard to improve your app experience and we're pleased to tell you that the app now supports flight vouchers issued by our Customer Services Team. You can redeem your voucher at checkout when you book your next flight with us. In this app version, you'll also find several fixes and improvements. If you’re flying with us soon, please remember to have a read of our Fly with Confidence web page: https://www.easyjet.com/en/fly-with-confidence.

‘Tis the season to be jolly… And you’ve definitely got a reason to be merry with our latest app update! Our app elves have worked their magic on a new low fare calendar, which will be available in the app very soon! Simply search for your flights as usual and you’ll see all our lowest fares for your chosen route in the date selection calendar, allowing you to quickly find low fares and make budget-friendly plans for your next easyJet trip. So, whether you're looking for a low-cost city break in Amsterdam or a bargain week in the sun in Majorca, we've got you.

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com.

Our developers have given the flight search results screen a fantastic makeover, hot on the heels of our recent low fare calendar. So, not only will you be able to easily find our lowest fares and make budget-friendly plans, but you'll also be able to view and compare our fare types, allowing you to choose the best option for your trip. You'll also notice a refreshed menu screen, just a little teaser for our brand new home screen, which will be heading your way soon!
